/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with lush green trees and towering buildings, creating a vibrant urban landscape. A white double-decker bus, a common sight in many cities, is seen driving down the street, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a sunny day. The image is bathed in natural daylight, highlighting the colors and details of the cityscape.
